meanings.sent1: The thunderstorm was frightful, making everyone hide indoors.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house was so frightful that no one dared to enter.
meanings.sent3: The cat's frightful attempt at a scary face made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the forest at night was frightful, like a blanket of fear.
meanings.sent5: The ghost's wail was a frightful sound that echoed through the halls.

meanings.sent4: The sight of the abandoned house was frightful, as if frozen in time.
